data.message: .I have never paid for facebook. Only use it to read posts, and send messages. I want to eliminate the part that requires me to pay for facebook. What is the phone contact number so that I can talk to a person?

replies.message: Thanks for reaching out, Nuala. Facebook is a free site and will never require that you pay to continue using the site. You do, however, have the option to make purchases related to games, apps and other items. In addition, if you choose to use Facebook from your mobile phone, keep in mind that you'll be responsible for any fees associated with internet usage and/or text messaging as determined by your mobile carrier. -Elizabeth
I will refrain from using my mobile phone for facebook, so that I do not incur any additional costs. Thanks for your reply.
